00019 LibraryTreeFilter::LibraryTreeFilter(LibraryInterface* handler, 
00020                                                                          VLNVDialer* dialer,
00021                                                                          QAbstractItemModel* sourceModel,
00022                 QObject *parent):
00023 QSortFilterProxyModel(parent), 
00024 handler_(handler),
00025 dialer_(dialer),
00026 firmness_(),
00027 implementation_(),
00028 hierarchy_(),
00029 vendorValidator_(this),
00030 libraryValidator_(this),
00031 nameValidator_(this),
00032 versionValidator_(this),
00033 vendor_(),
00034 library_(),
00035 name_(),
00036 version_() {
00037 
00038         Q_ASSERT(handler);
00039         Q_ASSERT(dialer);
00040 
00041         // set settings for filter
00042         setSortLocaleAware(true);
00043         setSortCaseSensitivity(Qt::CaseInsensitive);
00044 
00045         QRegExp regExp(QString("*"), Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::Wildcard);
00046         vendorValidator_.setRegExp(regExp);
00047         libraryValidator_.setRegExp(regExp);
00048         nameValidator_.setRegExp(regExp);
00049         versionValidator_.setRegExp(regExp);
00050 
00051         setSourceModel(sourceModel);
00052 
00053         connect(dialer, SIGNAL(vendorChanged(const QString&)),
00054                 this, SLOT(onVendorChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055         connect(dialer, SIGNAL(libraryChanged(const QString&)),
00056                 this, SLOT(onLibraryChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00057         connect(dialer, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), 
00058                 this, SLOT(onNameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00059         connect(dialer, SIGNAL(versionChanged(const QString&)),
00060                 this, SLOT(onVersionChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00061         connect(dialer, SIGNAL(firmnessChanged(const Utils::FirmnessOptions&)),
00062                 this, SLOT(onFirmnessChanged(const Utils::FirmnessOptions&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00063         connect(dialer, SIGNAL(implementationChanged(const Utils::ImplementationOptions&)),

00074 bool LibraryTreeFilter::filterAcceptsRow(int sourceRow,
00075                 const QModelIndex& sourceParent) const {
00076 
00077         QModelIndex itemIndex = sourceModel()->index(sourceRow, 0, sourceParent);
00078 
00079         // root item is always ok
00080         if (!itemIndex.isValid())
00081                 return true;
00082 
00083         LibraryItem* item = static_cast<LibraryItem*>(itemIndex.internalPointer());
00084 
00085         // get all vlnvs for the item
00086         QList<VLNV*> list;
00087         item->getVLNVs(list);
00088 
00089         // if none of the vlnvs match the search rules
00090         if (!checkVLNVs(list))
00091                 return false;
00092         
00093         foreach (VLNV* vlnv, list) {
00094 
00095                 if (!handler_->contains(*vlnv)) {
00096                         continue;
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComb = handler_->getModel(*vlnv);
00100 
00101                 // check the type
00102                 switch (handler_->getDocumentType(*vlnv)) {
00103                         case VLNV::COMPONENT: {
00104                                 // if components are not be displayed
00105                                 if (!type_.components_)
00106                                         continue;
00107                                 break;
00108                                                                   }
00109                         case VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION: {
00110                                 // if buses are not to be displayed
00111                                 if (!type_.buses_) {
00112                                         continue;
00113                                 }
00114 
00115                                 // abstraction definitions are always for hw
00116 
00117                                 // if hw is not shown then continue to check next 
00118                                 if (!implementation_.hw_)
00119                                         continue;
00120 
00121                                 else {
00122                                         return true;
00123                                 }
00124                                                                                           }
00125                         case VLNV::BUSDEFINITION: {
00126 
00127                                 // if buses are not to be displayed
00128                                 if (!type_.buses_) {
00129                                         continue;
00130                                 }
00131                                 QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComb.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
00132                                 // if this was not supposed to show then check next one
00133                                 if  (!checkBusType(busDef->getType()))
00134                                         continue;
00135                                 else
00136                                         return true;
00137                                                                           }
00138                         // if other types should be displayed
00139                         default:
00140                                 return type_.advanced_;
00141                 }
00142 
00143                 // the vlnv is for component for sure
00144                 QSharedPointer<Component> component = libComb.staticCast<Component>();
00145 
00146                 // if component does not match the filters
00147                 if (!checkImplementation(component) || !checkHierarchy(component) || !checkFirmness(component))
00148                         continue;
00149 
00150                 // if all tests passed
00151                 return true;
00152         }
00153 
00154         return false;
00155 }

00157 void LibraryTreeFilter::onVendorChanged( const QString& vendorText ) {
00158 
00159         // update the reg exp for validator
00160         QRegExp regExp(vendorText, Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::Wildcard);
00161         vendorValidator_.setRegExp(regExp);
00162 
00163         invalidateFilter();
00164 }

00213 bool LibraryTreeFilter::checkFirmness( QSharedPointer<Component> component ) const {
00214         Q_ASSERT(component);
00215 
00216         switch (component->getComponentFirmness()) {
00217                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_TEMPLATE: 
00218                         return firmness_.templates_;
00219 
00220                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_MUTABLE: 
00221                         return firmness_.mutable_;
00222 
00223                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_PARAMETERIZABLE: 
00224                         return firmness_.parameterizable_;
00225 
00226                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_FIXED: 
00227                         return firmness_.fixed_;
00228 
00229                 default:
00230                         return false;
00231         }
00232 }
00233 
00234 bool LibraryTreeFilter::checkImplementation( QSharedPointer<Component> component ) const {
00235         Q_ASSERT(component);
00236 
00237         switch (component->getComponentImplementation()) {
00238                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_HW:
00239                         return implementation_.hw_;
00240 
00241                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SW:
00242                         return implementation_.sw_;
00243 
00244                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SYS:
00245                         return implementation_.system_;
00246 
00247                 default:
00248                         return false;
00249         }
00250 }

00252 bool LibraryTreeFilter::checkHierarchy( QSharedPointer<Component> component ) const {
00253         Q_ASSERT(component);
00254 
00255         switch (component->getComponentHierarchy()) {
00256                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_GLOBAL:
00257                         return hierarchy_.global_;
00258 
00259                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_PRODUCT:
00260                         return hierarchy_.product_;
00261 
00262                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_BOARD:
00263                         return hierarchy_.board_;
00264 
00265                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_CHIP:
00266                         return hierarchy_.chip_;
00267 
00268                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_SOC:
00269                         return hierarchy_.soc_;
00270 
00271                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_IP:
00272                         return hierarchy_.ip_;
00273 
00274                 default:
00275                         return false;
00276         }
00277 }

00279 bool LibraryTreeFilter::checkVLNVs( const QList<VLNV*>& list ) const {
00280         foreach (VLNV* vlnv, list) {
00281 
00282                 int pos = 0;
00283 
00284                 // QT library Forced to use temp variables
00285                 QString vendor = vlnv->getVendor();
00286                 QString library =  vlnv->getLibrary();
00287                 QString name =  vlnv->getName();
00288                 QString version =  vlnv->getVersion();
00289 
00290 
00291                 // if the vlnv matches the search rules
00292                 if ((vendorValidator_.validate(vendor, pos) ==
00293                         QValidator::Acceptable) &&
00294                         (libraryValidator_.validate(library, pos) ==
00295                         QValidator::Acceptable) &&
00296                         (nameValidator_.validate(name, pos) ==
00297                         QValidator::Acceptable) &&
00298                         (versionValidator_.validate(version, pos) ==
00299                         QValidator::Acceptable)) {
00300 
00301                                 return true;
00302 
00303                 }
00304 
00305         }
00306 
00307         // if none of the vlnvs matched
00308         return false;
00309 }

00311 bool LibraryTreeFilter::checkBusType( KactusAttribute::BusDefType busType ) const {
00312 
00313         switch (busType) {
00314                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW: {
00315                         return implementation_.hw_;
00316                                                                                          }
00317                 case KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_API:
00318                 case  KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_MCAPI: {
00319                         return implementation_.sw_;
00320                                                                                                  }
00321                 default: 
00322                         return false;
00323         }
00324 }
